ROW.NAME: 布局组件定义
ROW.COLLIST: ID 编号,NAME 名称,CLS 分类,TITLE 标题,LOGOIMG LOGO图片

ROW.DATDSC: select * from V_LSYSURLCLASS where orgid='[%SYS_DEFORG]' order by id
select * from LHTML order by ID

ROW.NAME: 获取参数列表
ROW.DATDSC: select b.id,b.name||'('||b.MEMO||')' name from LHTML a,LHTMLDTL b where a.guid=b.formguid and a.id='[%id]' order by seqid
select GUID from LHTML where id='[%id]'
select cls id, NVL(cls,'未定义')||' ('||count(*)||')' name from LHtmL group by cls order by cls
select previews,id,name,note from LHtmL where NVL(cls,' ')=NVL('[%id]',' ') order by id
select * from LHTML where id like '%[%str]%' or name like '%[%str]%' order by id
